summary.Title: Massage therapist weekends
summary.Presentation:

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a massage therapist weekends primarily.

You are a social, smiling, active and independent person. You are a 'team player' and you love serving clients. You must be either an educated massage therapist or physioterapist with experience and interest in massage treatments.

You speak and write English as minimum, as you will have direct customer contact and keep journal in English or Danish. You are non-smoker.

We offer an international, respectful and friendly working environment with 17-20 colleagues of different ages and with different backgrounds. On an average day we work in teams of 1 hostess in our reception and 4-5 therapists focusing on treatments.

We all have in common that we love serving clients and giving them a better every day with deep tissue massage treatments. We have a large permanent clientele base coming in a regular flow which means you will have a working day with different clients and types of massage treatments from 30 min. to 120 min.
You must be enthusiastic about learning new treatments and being trained as we use our own techniques both when it comes to deep tissue massages and wellness massages.

The working hours are from 11-17:30/18 all days. Good possibilities to have more hours.

Read more about us and what we offer at https://www.ezanza.dk. 

Please send your application with photo and CV per. email to Mette at job@ezanza.dk.  I am willing to wait for the right candidate and therefore the position is open for as long at it takes to find you.

I look forward to getting your application.

 

Best regards Mette Stendell Jensen, owner

details.FormattedPurpose:
We are looking for a massage therapist weekends primarily.

You are a social, smiling, active and independent person. You are a 'team player' and you love serving clients. You must be either an educated massage therapist or physioterapist with experience and interest in massage treatments.

You speak and write English as minimum, as you will have direct customer contact and keep journal in English or Danish. You are non-smoker.

We offer an international, respectful and friendly working environment with 17-20 colleagues of different ages and with different backgrounds. On an average day we work in teams of 1 hostess in our reception and 4-5 therapists focusing on treatments.

We all have in common that we love serving clients and giving them a better every day with deep tissue massage treatments. We have a large permanent clientele base coming in a regular flow which means you will have a working day with different clients and types of massage treatments from 30 min. to 120 min.
You must be enthusiastic about learning new treatments and being trained as we use our own techniques both when it comes to deep tissue massages and wellness massages.

The working hours are from 11-17:30/18 all days. Good possibilities to have more hours.

Read more about us and what we offer at https://www.ezanza.dk. 

Please send your application with photo and CV per. email to Mette at job@ezanza.dk.  I am willing to wait for the right candidate and therefore the position is open for as long at it takes to find you.

I look forward to getting your application.
